pr_title: Update docs for delete data stream API to show that multiple names are supported

timeline.message: update docs for delete data stream API

timeline.bodyText:
I've been inconsistent with this, but or is technically incorrect as a list of wildcard expressions is supported. I'll open a PR to fix this in the other data stream API docs.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Comma-separated list of names or wildcard expressions of data streams to
          
          
            
            delete.
          
          
            
            Comma-separated list of data streams to delete.
          
          
            
            Wildcard (`*`) expressions are supported.
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -56,5 +56,5 @@ DELETE /_index_template/template
 
 `<data-stream>`::
 (Required, string)
-Name of the data stream to delete.
-Wildcard (`*`) expressions are supported.
+Comma-separated list of names or wildcard expressions of data streams to
+delete.
